channel.title: AI and Deep learning Blog
channel.description: A blog created to provide information about state of the art Deep learning and AI methods

item.title: Generate synthetic images of dislocation microstructure using Dreambooth
item.description: Finetuning dreambooth provides a unique way to generate synthetic images using just a couple of images. DreamBooth is a technique for personalizing text-to-image models such as Stable Diffusion by fine-tuning them with a small number of images (usually 3 to 5) of a specific subject. This method allows the model to generate images that incorporate the characteristics of the subject in new, synthesized scenes.
item.author: dr.krishangovind@gmail.com (Kishan Govind)
